name: Commander Luke Skywalker (V)
Lore: 'Hero of Yavin. Promoted to Commander in his third year of military training with the Alliance. Squadron flight leader at Echo Base during the Battle of Hoth.',
Text: 'Adds 3 to power of anything he pilots.  While piloting Rogue 1, it is maneuver +2 and Luke draws two battle destiny if unable to otherwise.  During your control phase, may use 1 Force to take a speeder or a card with ''T-47'' in game text into hand from Reserve Deck; reshuffle.  Immune to attrition < 3.(Errata Text - September 9th, 2009)',
